revised_title: Obituary of Captain Sir Frederick J. O. Evans: A Distinguished Naval Officer and Pioneer in Nautical Astronomy and Terrestrial Magnetism
tldr: The obituary of Captain Sir Frederick J. O. Evans, a renowned naval officer, highlights his significant contributions to nautical astronomy, surveying, and terrestrial magnetism. His work laid the foundation for modern maritime navigation and compass technology, and he played a crucial role in the development of ironclad warships during the 19th century.
